title: 3D Stem Plot
description: This lab demonstrates how to create a 3D stem plot using the Matplotlib library in Python. A stem plot is a way of plotting data points by drawing vertical lines from a baseline to the data point and placing a marker at the tip.

meta.title: Create Stunning 3D Stem Plots with Python
meta.description: Learn how to generate captivating 3D stem plots using Matplotlib in Python, perfect for data visualization.
meta.keywords: matplotlib, 3d stem plot, python, data visualization, numpy
